00031 class ITypeInfo
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     virtual ~ITypeInfo(){}
00035     virtual bool operator==(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const=0;
00036     virtual bool operator!=(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const=0;
00037     virtual bool before(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const=0;

00042 template<typename T> class TypeInfo : public ITypeInfo
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     bool operator==(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const
00046     {
00047         return typeid(T)==rhs.Info();
00048     }
00049     bool operator!=(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const
00050     {
00051         return typeid(T)!=rhs.Info();
00052     }
00053     bool before(const ITypeInfo &rhs) const
00054     {
00055         return typeid(T).before(rhs.Info());
00056     }
00057     string Name() const
00058     {
00059         return demangle(typeid(T).name());
00060     }
00061     const type_info& Info() const
00062     {
00063         return typeid(T);
00064     }
00065 };
00066 
00067 template<typename T> const ITypeInfo& TypeID(const T&)
00068 {
00069     return TypeID<T>();
00070 }
00071 template<typename T> const ITypeInfo& TypeID()
00072 {
00073     static TypeInfo<T> ti;
00074     return ti;
